ElementAriaMultiSelectable.summary: The ariaMultiSelectable property of the interface reflects the value of the aria-multiselectable attribute, which indicates that the user may select more than one item from the current selectable descendants.

blockquote.para: Note: Where possible use an HTML select element as this has built in semantics and does not require ARIA attributes.

ElementAriaMultiSelectable.value: A string with one of the following values:
